net.kencochrane.raven

Class Raven

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kencochrane.raven.Raven

  • public class Raven
extends Object
    Raven is a client for Sentry allowing to send an Event that will be processed and sent to a Sentry server.

    It is recommended to create an instance of Raven through RavenFactory.createRavenInstance(Dsn), this will use the best factory available to create a sensible instance of Raven.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String NAME
      Version of this client, the major version is the current supported Sentry protocol, the minor version changes for each release of this project.
      static ThreadLocal<Boolean> RAVEN_THREAD
      Indicates whether the current thread has been spawned within raven or not.
